text: Trishneet Arora (born 2 November 1993, Ludhiana, Punjab) is the founder and CEO of TAC Security, a cybersecurity company . Despite dropping out of school, he has become a sought-after expert in the field . Arora was named in Forbes 30 Under 30 Asia 2018 and Fortune Indiaâ€™s 40 Under 40 list in 2019 . In 2024, he was listed among the Top 10 youngest Indian billionaires on the Hurun Rich List with a net worth of $130 million (Rs 1,100 crore) . == Personal life == Trishneet also invest in startups as an angel investor. In 2020 invested in online gaming company Oneiric. == References == Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Indian businesspeople Category:People from Punjab, India
title: Trishneet Arora
